original_query: SELECT MIN(c.Id) FROM comments as c, postHistory as ph, badges as b, users as u WHERE u.Id = b.UserId AND u.Id = ph.UserId AND u.Id = c.UserId AND c.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-08-28 00:18:24' AS TIMESTAMP) AND b.Date>=CAST('2010-09-15 02:50:48' AS TIMESTAMP) AND u.Reputation>=1 AND u.Reputation<=1443 AND u.DownVotes>=0 AND u.DownVotes<=3
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM comments AS comments WHERE comments.CreationDate <= TIMESTAMP '2014-08-28 00:18:24'
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM badges AS badges WHERE badges.Date >= TIMESTAMP '2010-09-15 02:50:48'

CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT * FROM users AS users WHERE CAST(users.Reputation AS INTEGER) >= 1 AND CAST(users.Reputation AS INTEGER) <= 1443 AND (CAST(users.DownVotes AS INTEGER) >= 0 AND CAST(users.DownVotes AS INTEGER) <= 3)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E3E4 AS SELECT * FROM E3 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4 WHERE E3.UserId=E4.Id)
CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM postHistory AS postHistory
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E3E4E2 AS SELECT * FROM E3E4 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2 WHERE E3E4.UserId=E2.UserId)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E3E4E2 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3E4E2 WHERE E1.UserId=E3E4E2.UserId)
